title: Sts Cosmas and Damian Novena
description: Saints Cosmas and Damian were twin brothers born in Arabia in the 3rd century AD who became physicians. They are the patron saints of surgeons, physicians, identical twins, twins, dentists, protectors of children, barbers, pharmacists, veterinarians, orphanages, day-care centers, confectioners, against hernia, against the plague.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

O glorious martyrs, Saints Cosmas and Damian, physicians of souls and bodies, who during life sought only to do good to all who came to you, hear my humble prayer. You practiced medicine not merely to heal the body but to win souls for Christ. Through your intercession, may I receive health of soul and body, and come to share eternal glory with you in Heaven. You who served God by serving others through your medical skills, who refused payment for your services, and who ultimately gave your lives for your faith in Christ, please hear my petitions, (mention request here‚Ä¶) Help me to imitate your charity, your selflessness, and your unwavering faith. Pray that I may be healed of all illnesses of body and soul according to God‚Äôs holy will. Amen

O God, we thank you for the wonderful example of Saints Cosmas and Damian, who served you faithfully even unto death. Through their intercession, grant us health of mind and body, that with pure hearts we may glorify You, the supreme physician and Savior of souls. Through Christ our Lord. Amen. Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be Sts Cosmas and Damian, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
